species.name: Aar'aa
species.description: Chameleon-skinned reptilians prized for covert work thanks to slow, adaptive pigmentation.
species.personality: Proud, close-lipped, opportunistic; moods shift quickly when temperatures rise or fall.
species.physicalDescription: Tall, pebbled reptiles with dorsal skin crests, clawed hands and eyes that glow above heavy brows; their hides gradually match nearby colors.

languages.description: Aar'aa speak Aarese and can manage heavily accented Basic with practice.

species.adventurers: Often serve as assassins, infiltrators, bodyguards, thieves and other stealth-focused specialists.

specialAbilities.name: Skin-Changing
specialAbilities.description: After one full round pressed against a surface—longer for intricate patterns—an Aar'aa gains +4D to Sneak while camouflaged.

storyFactors.name: Cold-Blooded
storyFactors.description: In cold environments their metabolism falters; apply -1D to Dexterity and Strength skills when conditions are frigid.
